Member Function Documentation

virtual ihotf::IHotfolderWorkflowItem* ihotf::IHotfolderWorkflow::AddHotfolder ( const QString &  hotfolderName,
const QString &  hotfolderId = QString() 
)
pure virtual

Add a hotfolder to the workflow.

The name of the hotfolder must be unique, otherwise no folder will be added an the function returns null.

Implemented in ihotf::CHotfolderWorkflowComp.
